name: Super Awesome Mage Power Ultra Magic Madness
name_original: Super Awesome Mage Power Ultra Magic Madness
description:
Using your power (LMB), getting hit or getting to close to enemies will make you insane, try to hide and calm down (RMB) before turning completely insane !

If you are out of health, or if your insanity level reach 100%, then you are dead ! You can pick up new spells on the floor of the dungeon, but they will raise your insanity based on the damage they do.

Controls :

  • Mouse Look : Aim
  • Left Mouse Button : Fire Spell

  • Right Mouse Button : Regain Sanity

  • Z or Up : Move Forward

  • S or Down¨: Move Backward
  • Q or Left : Move Left
  • D or Right : Move Right

Who never wanted to have more and more magic power ? But be carefull, using your magic powers will drive you crazy. Super Awesome Mage Power Ultra Magic Madness is a 2D Topdown Roguelike game, you are a wizard and you have to go to the end of the levels without being insane.

Use your mouse to aim for the enemies and fire your magic spell with the left mouse button. The more you use your magic powers, the more difficult it will be to control their trajectory. So you have to regain your sanity by calming down and pressing the right mouse button.

Try to reach the boss room and kill him if you can !

If you are out of health, or if your insanity level reach 100%, then you are dead !

Note :

This is our first LD for us. We hope you’re gonna enjoy our game :) Have fun !
